events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because I do not want to keep the product.
The customer issue has been classified under the Refund cluster due to the request for a money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah T. to handle the refund request efficiently and promptly.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I'm here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide the order number and the details of the item you received so we can process your refund?
My order number is 1234567, and instead of the blue jacket, I got a green sweater that I did not order.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 5 business days.
That sounds good, thank you for your prompt response and for resolving this issue quickly.
The refund process has been completed on our side. Please expect the amount to be credited within the specified time.
We are following up to ensure you have received your refund. Please let us know if there are any further concerns.
Closing this case now as the refund has been successfully issued and the customer has confirmed satisfaction.
